categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker actors

nodes.text: Liam Cook is a British puppeteer who portrays Ochi of Bestoon in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. He also served as a creature performer and puppeteer for the movie, as well as Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and Solo: A Star Wars Story; and worked as a creature and droid puppeteer on Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.

Cook worked on the 2015 Doctor Who Christmas special "The Husbands of River Song" as the internal operator of the robot body of the villainous King Hydroflax. He also served as an assistant puppeteer on the 2019 Netflix series The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance.
